message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="editor" color="purple" summary="Requesting Reporting Protocol feedback">
Hi — I'm synthesizing all team feedback on the Reporting Protocol for the Standby Reader. Could you please send me your feedback/suggestions if you haven't already? I need submissions from all experts to create a unified revision plan. Thanks.
</teammate-message>

input.content: Already submitted — my detailed feedback was sent to you earlier in this session. It includes: (1) essay-specific follow-up proposals for all 8 essays + Appendix, (2) a Preface retrospective question, (3) an Essay 5 experiential check for the Poetic/lucid dreamscape, (4) recommendation to skip Essay 3 follow-up to avoid double-probing, (5) word count instead of page count. Let me know if you need me to resend or clarify anything.
input.summary: Already submitted earlier — can resend if needed

routing.summary: Already submitted earlier — can resend if needed

content.text: Confirmed to editor that my feedback was already submitted. Offered to resend if needed. Awaiting next task.
